Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: உள்ளுவ தெல்லாம் உயர்வுள்ளல் மற்றது தள்ளினுந் தள்ளாமை நீர்த்து.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: In all that a man thinks of, let him think of greatness; and if it should be thrust from him (by fate), it will have the nature of not being thrust from him.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown aiming an arrow not at a normal target, but at a star in the high heavens, symbolizing the act of aiming for the greatest possible goal ('உள்ளுவதெல்லாம் உயர்வுள்ளல்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Even if fate, represented by a cosmic wind ('தள்ளினும்'), pushes the arrow slightly off course so it doesn't hit the star, the arrow still flies incredibly high, far above all the lower, mundane targets.
Layered_Composition.Background: The act of aiming high ensures that even in 'failure', the achievement is still of a high nature ('தள்ளாமை நீர்த்து'). The arrow lands on a high mountain peak, not in the valley below.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Always aim for the highest goal. Even if fate makes you fall short, the failure will still be of a noble and high standard.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: Aiming at a star is the metaphor for thinking of greatness. The arrow landing on a high mountain peak instead of the valley floor, despite being blown off course, shows the noble nature of 'failure' when aiming high.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Ambitious, noble, aspiring, resilient even in failure.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A majestic, cosmic night scene. The stars and the archer's arrow trail glow with a brilliant, hopeful light. The colors are deep and inspiring.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A low-angle shot, following the arrow's high trajectory across the sky.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The primary light comes from the stars and the moon, creating a magical atmosphere.

Negative_Prompt: person aiming low, arrow falling to the ground, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the cosmic wind effect.
